channel.title: Comments on: Using Windows Server 2008 as a Desktop OS
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: Funny side note: I got home from work today and she wanted to kill me because I hadn't installed office on the new machine yet and I forgot to point her laptop at the new printer location ;(
item.content:encoded: Funny side note: I got home from work today and she wanted to kill me because I hadn’t installed office on the new machine yet and I forgot to point her laptop at the new printer location ;(

item.title: By: ca8msm
item.dc:creator: ca8msm
item.description: Nice, I've got a 2008 server sat at home doing nothing so I think I'll go through these and see whether it may make it a bit more usable.
item.content:encoded: Nice, I’ve got a 2008 server sat at home doing nothing so I think I’ll go through these and see whether it may make it a bit more usable.
